buildings.name: Lumber Mill
buildings.description: Process timber into usable wood. Lumberjacks supply materials for construction.

tiers.flavorText: The strength of a tree flows through you.
The might of the forest empowers you.
The World Tree's might is yours.
Finish the wounded with deadly force.
The final blow is always fatal.
Drain life essence like tree sap.
Drink deeply from the wellspring of life.
The World Tree's blessing heals all.
Critical hits fell enemies like trees.
The forest refuses to let you fall.
Heavy wood adds weight to your blows.
Ancient oak's fury builds with kills.
World Tree's might stacks with kills.
